content:
本件保存七年
03-62- 2482
August 13, 2
MEMORANDUM
: Mr. H. T. Potter, Supply Advisor, U. S. AID/C Through : H. K. Shao, Acting Chief, Third Division
from : Stephen Tan
Original Signed by H. .. Shao
Subject : Consignment of Three Toyota Buses for CUSA
Reference is made to your letter MC-283 of July 31, 1962 concerning the captioned subject.
We are returning herewith two copies of the Shipping and Receiving Documents for one Toyota bus imported ex. s. s. Buckeye State on July 3 and 2 buses of the same make 3, s. s. Steel Recorder on July 5, 1962 which were taken delivery by ICHth on July 18 and August 3, 1962 respectively.
COPY E- 16. 13. 2
The above documents have been duly endorsed y CUSA for your reference and record.
D
國史馆 Academia Historica
33

paragraphs.content: : Mr. H. T. Potter, Supply Advisor, U. S. AID/C Through : H. K. Shao, Acting Chief, Third Division
Subject : Consignment of Three Toyota Buses for CUSA
Reference is made to your letter MC-283 of July 31, 1962 concerning the captioned subject.

We are returning herewith two copies of the Shipping and Receiving Documents for one Toyota bus imported ex. s. s. Buckeye State on July 3 and 2 buses of the same make 3, s. s. Steel Recorder on July 5, 1962 which were taken delivery by ICHth on July 18 and August 3, 1962 respectively.
The above documents have been duly endorsed y CUSA for your reference and record.
